nl.naturalis.nda.elasticsearch.load

Class CSVExtractor

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.naturalis.nda.elasticsearch.load.CSVExtractor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<CSVRecordInfo>, Iterator<CSVRecordInfo>

    public class CSVExtractor
extends Object
implements Iterator<CSVRecordInfo>, Iterable<CSVRecordInfo>
    A generic CSV extraction component taking raw CSV lines as input and outputting commons-csv CSVRecordInfo instances.
    Author:
    Ayco Holleman

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  CSVExtractor.NoSuchFieldException
      Thrown by a CSVExtractor if a client specified an invalid field number (less than zero or greater than the number of fields in the CSV record).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CSVExtractor(File csvFile, ETLStatistics stats)
      Creates a CSV extractor for the specified CSV file and updating the specified statistics object as it extracts records from the file.
